name: Liniker
description: '''Liniker de Barros Ferreira Campos''' ([[Araraquara]], 3 July 1995), widely known as '''Liniker''', is a Brazilian singer-songwriter and former bandleader for Brazilian [[Soul music|soul]] and [[Black music]] band [[:pt:Liniker e os Caramelows|Liniker e os Caramelows]]. Her voice has been described as 'powerful and low-pitched' with a 'slightly raspy, soul-singer' character as well as 'versatile' with a 'recurrent falsetto' and 'easily recognisable timbre'â€”with occasional comparisons arising towards [[Tim Maia]]. Liniker is an openly [[trans woman]], and her music is an influence on young Brazilians facing [[Sexism|gender discrimination]], an audience which 'rarely finds itself represented in [[Music of Brazil|Brazilian music]].'
